profile:
Jamie works within a 200 km radius of St. John’s.

Call today 709-880-4204

I serve St. John’s all the way to Hearts delight and conception bay North and South. If you are within 2 hours of Metro. I will work for you. 

Please note I have a job minimum of $650. Most plaster repairs require 3-4 visits. 

Google us!  http://drywallstjohns.ca

Simply visit the website for all the info you need and you can contact me there though the form at the bottom. I will get back to you right away. Try and see. 

709-880-4204 call or text. I usually answer.

Jamie does his own work! When you hire him that’s who shows up. A proud family man with 26 years in the drywall, plastering and painting industry.

I AWAIT YOUR CALL

I Can give you instant quote with good pictures or videos and description of what you need done.

Text to the above number You will not be disappointed!

450 homestars  reviews. Quality work, dependable.

Tape mud

Knockdown

Drywall repairs — wall and ceilings 

All sanding dustless. (You will be very impressed!)

Skim coating walls and ceilings to make new again 

Painting 

Spraying 

Plastering in St. John’s N.L

Has a plumber/electrician made holes all over your home? I can bring your areas back to new!!

Serving 100 km radius around St. John’s, CBS, Mount Pearl, Bay Robert's, Carbonear 

Full company liability insurance 

Workplace NL insured

384 homestars reviews. Visit our website to read all the reviews 

Old fashioned service and quality every time!! Extremely reliable, friendly, skilled

Jamie has been pleasing homeowners for 25 years mainly in St. John’s, Calgary, and Ottawa All under the exact name Call Jamie Painting and Drywall! With an outstanding reputation in all places. Just read the reviews for yourself to see!

If you are looking for a tradesman to stand out clearly in a clouded market of pull a name from a hat mentality, Jamie is a great choice! Communication will blow you away, not to mention high quality skills and cleanliness

Also note I do own Call Jamie Ottawa Popcorn removal and plaster in Ontario as I work there in the summers.
